analytic.title: Doctrinal Union or Agreement to Disagree? Armenians and Syrians at the Synod of Manazkert (726 CE)

monogr.title: Bridging Times and Spaces: Papers in Ancient Near Eastern, Mediterranean and Armenian Studies Honouring Gregory E. Areshian on the Occasion of His Sixty-Fifth Birthday

body.bibl: Cowe, S. Peter. “Doctrinal Union or Agreement to Disagree? Armenians and Syrians at the Synod of Manazkert (726 CE).” In Bridging Times and Spaces: Papers in Ancient Near Eastern, Mediterranean and Armenian Studies Honouring Gregory E. Areshian on the Occasion of His Sixty-Fifth Birthday, edited by Pavel S. Avetisyan and Yervand H. Grekyan, 61–84. Oxford: Archaeopress, 2017.

S. Peter Cowe, Doctrinal Union or Agreement to Disagree? Armenians and Syrians at the Synod of Manazkert (726 CE), in Bridging Times and Spaces: Papers in Ancient Near Eastern, Mediterranean and Armenian Studies Honouring Gregory E.
